Lectures

Following is the general pattern for covering each topic :

  • Saturday (3 hrs) : Introduce topic and cover major part of it.
    Assignment- prepare five questions each from text and slides, attempt three excercise questions from the topics covered.
  • Wednesday (2 hrs): Continue with some more portion of topic and keep an hour for discussion of last week assignment.

Chapter 0: Introduction to Python for Quantitative Research
